function solution(start, end) {
  return Array.from({ length: end - start + 1 }, () => {
    return start++;
  });
}

My solution.js

function solution(n) {
  var answer = [];
  answer.push(n);
  while (n !== 1) {
    if (n % 2 === 0) {
      n = n / 2;
      answer.push(n);
    } else {
      n = 3 * n + 1;
      answer.push(n);
    }
  }
  return answer;
}

Best solution.js

function solution(n, arr = []) {
  arr.push(n);
  if (n === 1) return arr;
  if (n % 2 === 0) return solution(n / 2, arr);
  return solution(3 * n + 1, arr);
}
